content: ***the slouch hat pattern is available for free on my website visit pattern website link above or you can download it here on ravelry as a printable ad-free pdf *** https //kirstenhollowaydesigns com/2019/08/super-easy-vstitch-crochet-slouch-hat-pattern html looking for a super easy crochet slouchy hat to add to your fall wardrobe this free pattern is so fast and simple to crochet you ll be able to quickly make enough hats to match all your favorite outfits **includes an exclusive beanie pattern in the ad-free pdf purchase ** don t forget to download **both** pdfs **difficulty ** easy **materials needed ** 150-175 yards lion brand jeans colors yarn in jump suit or khaki or #3 yarn of your choice see additional notes section 6mm hook or hook needed to obtain gauge yarn needle scissors **stitches used ** chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet decrease = single_crochet 2 together <--if you re not sure how to work the stitch check out this video from nicki s homemade crafts **special stitches ** v_stitch = work double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in same stitch **additional terms ** blo = back loop only work all stitches for the designated round including the decrease in the band in the back loop only **gauge ** circle measures 4 1/2 across after round 7 **additional notes ** -chain-1 at beginning of round does not count as a stitch -this slouch hat pattern comes in two style options very slouchy and slightly slouchy follow notes in pattern for the style you prefer -pattern can be modified to fit a child by going down a hook size and only doing 4 repeats of 9-12 -**please note ** lion brand jeans yarn is classified as a #4 worsted however it is much thinner than most worsted weight yarns and compares closer to #3 light weight yarns please take this into account if you wish to substitute yarns lion brand mandala and lion brand comfy cotton are close in thickness to the jeans or jeans colors yarn
